name: Borchester Software
notes: Adam Macy works for Borchester Software as an IT consultant; Adam and Ian may mention this entity

people.name: Oscar Singh
people.role: Colleague who Adam often works with

name: Grey Gables Hotel
notes: This is the hotel in Ambridge where Ian Craig works as a chef

name: The Bull
notes: This is the popular village pub in the village of Ambridge, where a lot of Adam and Ian's family and friends live, work and socialise
